Title: QuickUIT
Description: QuickUIT, short for 'Quick User Interface Testing', is an API for testing applications based on the Microsoft UI Automation framework. QuickUIT provides a simple, object-oriented interface for finding and interacting with automation elements.  It is developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
QuickUIT, short for 'Quick User Interface Testing', is an API for testing applications based on the Microsoft UI Automation framework. QuickUIT provides a simple, object-oriented interface for finding and interacting with automation elements. It is developed in C#.

Features
  • Object-oriented API
  • Matching by regular expressions
  • Automatic synchronization code
